Title: Takeaways: Dennis Smith Jr.’s first start with the Pistons, Saben Lee makes the most of his minutes
Description: Dennis Smith Jr. was the next man up. While he showed some flashes, the consistency that Wright provided was sorely missed in the Pistons’ 105-96 loss to the Orlando Magic on Sunday. Rookie Saben Lee set out to show what he has been developing,
Author: MLive on MSN.com
